nodes.bodyText: Shouldn't we change the paragraph above to state that one should use JDK 11 instead? (language level may still stay at 8.0)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -39,7 +39,7 @@ After opening the project in IntelliJ, double check that the Java SDK is properl
 Presto comes with sample configuration that should work out-of-the-box for development. Use the following options to create a run configuration:
 
 * Main Class: `io.prestosql.server.PrestoServer`
-* VM Options: `-ea -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:G1HeapRegionSize=32M -XX:+UseGCOverheadLimit -XX:+ExplicitGCInvokesConcurrent -Xmx2G -Dconfig=etc/config.properties -Dlog.levels-file=etc/log.properties -Djdk.attach.allowAttachSelf=true`
+* VM Options: `-ea -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:G1HeapRegionSize=32M -XX:+UseGCOverheadLimit -XX:+ExplicitGCInvokesConcurrent -Xmx2G -Dconfig=etc/config.properties -Dlog.levels-file=etc/log.properties -Djdk.attach.allowAttachSelf=true -Dpresto-temporarily-allow-java8=true`

nodes.bodyText: to be honest, idk, let's ask @findepi

nodes.bodyText: Yes, this should talk about running with Java 11. We're going to make that a requirement soon.

nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            When running on JDK8 `VM Options` must be supplemented with `-Dpresto-temporarily-allow-java8=true` in order to Presto to start.    
          
          
            
            When running on Java 8 `VM Options` must be supplemented with `-Dpresto-temporarily-allow-java8=true` in order to Presto to start.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -49,6 +49,8 @@ Additionally, the Hive plugin must be configured with the location of your Hive
 
     -Dhive.metastore.uri=thrift://localhost:9083
 
+When running on JDK8 `VM Options` must be supplemented with `-Dpresto-temporarily-allow-java8=true` in order to Presto to start.

nodes.bodyText:
This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * Java 8 Update 161 or higher (8u161+), 64-bit is minimal supported version. Java 11 is recommended although it's not required yet. Both Oracle JDK and OpenJDK are supported.
          
          
            
            * Java 8 Update 161 or higher (8u161+), 64-bit is minimal supported version. Java 11 is recommended and will
          
          
            
              soon become required.

 * Mac OS X or Linux

+* Java 8 Update 161 or higher (8u161+), 64-bit is minimal supported version. Java 11 is recommended although it's not required yet. Both Oracle JDK and OpenJDK are supported.
